title: Look and Lease up to 8 weeks Free
posting_body: ['A NEW TAKE ON CITY LIVING - now offering 10 WEEKS + 1,000 FREE RENT!----advertised on a net effective lease term of 16 months', 'Sophisticated apartment living is arriving at the intersection of Broadway and Piedmont.', 'Studio, one and two bedroom spaces feature unmatched amenities never before seen in Oakland.', 'With the genuine fixtures and modern finishes, you’ll love the stylish comfort of staying right at home.', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 218', 'OR Text', '218', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Use this link for more info:',
